TITLE: "Prescription for housing? California wants Medicaid to cover 6 months of rent"
DESCRIPTION: Gov. Gavin Newsom, whose administration is struggling to contain a worsening homelessness crisis despite record spending, is trying something bold: tapping federal health care funding to cover rent for homeless people and those at risk of losing their housing.

TITLE: "End of covid emergency will usher in changes across the US health system"
DESCRIPTION: The Biden administration's decision to end the covid-19 public health emergency in May will institute sweeping changes across the health care system that go far beyond many people having to pay more for covid tests.

TITLE: "A lot of thought, little action: Proposals about mental health go unheeded"
DESCRIPTION: Thousands of people struggle to access mental health services in Florida. The treatment system is disjointed and complex.

TITLE: "Illumina launches its first product enabling long- and short-read sequencing on one instrument"
DESCRIPTION: Illumina Inc., a global leader in DNA sequencing and array-based technologies, today announced that its first product based on its novel Illumina Complete Long Read technology is now available to order.

TITLE: "Berkeley Lights Completes Acquisition of IsoPlexis Forming PhenomeX, the Functional Cell Biology Company"
DESCRIPTION: Berkeley Lights today announced that it has completed its previously announced acquisition of IsoPlexis Corporation, a company empowering labs to leverage the cells and proteome changing the course of human health.

TITLE: "Gyros Protein Technologies introduces new PurePep EasyClean services to accelerate development and manufacturing of peptide-based drugs"
DESCRIPTION: Gyros Protein Technologies AB today announced the launch of three service offerings to support development and manufacturing of peptide-based drugs.

TITLE: "Insulin resistance increases retinopathy and nephropathy risk in young type 1 diabetics"
DESCRIPTION: A study published in the journal Cardiovascular Diabetology describes the relationship between estimated glucose disposal rate (eGDR) and retinopathy or kidney disease in young adults with type 1 diabetes.

TITLE: "Tetravalent COVID vaccine provides broad antibody responses against SARS-CoV-2 variants in animal model"
DESCRIPTION: In a recent study posted to the bioRxiv* preprint server, researchers in Italy and the United States evaluated the efficacy and immunogenicity of an adjuvanted tetravalent severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) spike (S) protein subunit 1 (S1) COVID-19 vaccine.

TITLE: "Prior COVID and vaccination generate superior hybrid immunity"
DESCRIPTION: In a recent article published in the journal Science Translational Medicine, researchers in France performed a long-term longitudinal analysis to demonstrate the benefits of hybrid immunity to severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2), i.e., induced by viral infection followed by vaccination.

TITLE: "Loss of smell following COVID-19 recovery: How long could it last?"
DESCRIPTION: In a recent study posted to the Preprints with The Lancet* server, researchers in China conducted a multi-center, retrospective study to gather data on the prevalence of olfactory dysfunction (OD) after three years of recovering from coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
